mapper.select: select buy_seq, menu_seq, buy_cnt, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id from buy
select buy_seq, menu_seq, buy_cnt, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id from buy where 1 = 1 and buy_seq = :1
mapper.update: insert into buy ( buy_seq, menu_seq, buy_cnt, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( buy_seq.nextval, :1, :2, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :4 )
update buy set menu_seq =:1, buy_cnt =:2, up_user_id =:3 where buy_seq =:5
